alert.note: Alert for Dade; Jasper; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:42AM CDT until April 05 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 442 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Golden City to 11 miles east of Carthage to near Sarcoxie, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Sarcoxie, Miller, Everton, Stotts City, Halltown, Avilla, La Russell, Chesapeake, Red Oak, Dudenville, Maple Grove, Pennsboro and Meinert. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 27 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
